interpretation:
The detective card represents a need for investigation and analysis in your life. It can indicate that you need to trust your intuition and pay attention to the details in order to solve a mystery or problem. This card encourages you to be observant and to look beneath the surface to discover the truth. It also suggests that you may need to use your analytical skills to uncover hidden information or secrets.

In relationships, the detective card can indicate a need to trust your instincts and investigate any suspicions you may have. It may be time to dig deeper and uncover the truth about a situation or person. At work, this card suggests that you may need to analyze a problem or situation in order to find a solution. You may need to gather more information and use your detective skills to get to the bottom of things.

Overall, the detective card encourages you to be curious and investigative in all areas of your life. Trust your intuition, pay attention to details, and be willing to dig deeper in order to uncover the truth.
